input.sentences: the church was absolutely beautiful on the outside .
the inside of the church was massive and intricately designed .
the children learned some important life lessons that day .
and drew them down instead of writing them down .
output.sentences: Cousin Harry was getting married today at St. Albans Church.
We found a place to sit.
My sister decided to draw cousin Harry coming down the long aisle.
Mom thought it was a really good likeness.
